dict.acceptation: 腿；支柱，支架；裤腿；一段赛程；

sent.orig: Method: Leg medial skin flap cross transposition was used for repairing contra-lateral leg bone exposure.
sent.trans: 方法：应用小腿内侧皮瓣交叉移位修复对侧小腿骨外露。

sent.orig: Then, leg lifting, extending further far as possible, leg extending forward, tip of toe drawing backward.
sent.trans: 然后，左腿抬起，尽量远伸，腿跟向前伸，脚尖向后勾。

sent.orig: On count of 3, rock and shift your weight from your leg to your front leg.
sent.trans: 数到3时，摆动身子，将你的体重从后腿移向前腿。

sent.orig: My leg hurts and I cannot stand.I think my leg is broken.
sent.trans: 我的腿痛，不能站立。我的腿好像骨折了。

sent.orig: Conclusions It is effective to treat leg open, fracture with prophylactic application of leg muscular flap.
sent.trans: 结论预防性肌瓣一期应用对小腿、度开放性骨折及合并严重软组织缺损的治疗可取得良好疗效。
